At Eywec, we believe that eyewear is a part of our identity, and that's why we want to provide you with the best possible eyewear experience. Whether you're a serious collector or just starting out, our selection of high-quality eyewear frames is sure to satisfy your eyewear needs. At Eywec, we believe that the best way to connect with other eyewear enthusiasts is through shared experiences. That's why we offer a wide range of products, including eyewear frames, lenses, and accessories. Whether you're a serious collector or just starting out, our selection is sure to satisfy your eyewear needs. High-quality eyewear frames hold a unique allure, each one a tangible piece of eyewear history. From classic aviator styles to cutting-edge technology, these devices evoke nostalgia and style. Many eyewear frames were crafted by skilled artisans, each model telling a unique story of design evolution and innovation. These frames captured moments frozen in time, preserving memories and emotions for generations to come. Eyewear frames represent a bygone era when photography was a meticulous process, requiring patience and skill. They embody a sense of authenticity and character that is often missing in modern digital counterparts. Each eyewear frame has its own distinct features and quirks, reflecting the ingenuity of its creators and the technological limitations of its time. Some frames boast intricate leather straps and hand-carved wooden bodies, while others feature sleek metal designs and precision engineering. From classic round frames to modern cat-eye designs, eyewear frames come in a variety of shapes and sizes, each with its own unique charm. Owning an eyewear frame is more than just possessing a functional tool; it's a connection to the past and a celebration of craftsmanship. Eyewear enthusiasts often spend hours researching and collecting these artifacts, scouring thrift stores, estate sales, and online marketplaces in search of rare finds. For many photographers, using an eyewear frame is a deeply immersive experience, transporting them to a different era and inspiring creativity. Despite their age, many eyewear frames are still capable of producing stunning images, showcasing the enduring quality of their design and construction. While they may lack the convenience of modern digital eyewear, their manual controls and mechanical precision offer a level of control and artistry that is unparalleled. Owning and using an eyewear frame requires dedication and care, as these delicate instruments require maintenance and occasional repair. However, for those who appreciate the craftsmanship and history behind these devices, the rewards far outweigh the challenges. Eyewear frames are not just tools for capturing images; they are works of art in their own right, deserving of preservation and admiration. In a world dominated by digital technology, eyewear frames offer a refreshing alternative, reminding us of the beauty and simplicity of analog eyewear. Whether displayed on a shelf as a decorative piece or worn for a nostalgic photo shoot, eyewear frames continue to captivate and inspire photographers of all ages. They are more than just relics of the past; they are timeless treasures that continue to shape the way we see and experience the world. pages.privacy-policy: Eywec's Privacy Policy terms: Protecting Shopping Experience Palaroidew Home Catalog About Contacts Home Catalog About Contacts Privacy Policy for Eywec Online Store of Glasses Eywec takes your privacy seriously and is committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect any information we may collect from you when you use our website. When you visit our website, we may collect information about the device you are using to access the website, such as the type of browser and operating system you are using. We may also collect information about how you interact with our website, including the pages you visit, links you click on, and forms you fill out. We may use this information to improve our website and our services. We may collect personal information from you when you place an order, subscribe to a newsletter, fill out a form or enter information on our site. This information may include your name, email address, phone number, billing and shipping addresses, and other information. We use the information we collect for the following purposes: To process orders and manage your account. To send you information and updates about your orders, including details about products you have purchased and any new products we launch. To improve our website and our services. This includes analyzing how users interact with our website and improving the functionality, layout, and design of our website. We may also use this information to create reports on website usage and website performance. To send you marketing and promotional materials, and to notify you about new products, special offers, and other information we think you might be interested in. We may share your information with third parties who help us use and protect your information, such as service providers, contractors, and affiliates. We may also share your information with our parent company, subsidiaries, and affiliates for the purposes described in this Privacy Policy. You have the right to access, correct, or delete any personal information that we have about you. If you would like to review, update, or delete your personal information, please contact us. Your use of our website is subject to our Terms & Conditions of Use. We do not use cookies to track your personal information. If you do not accept our cookies, you may be able to access some features on our website but not others. You can manage your ad preferences by visiting the Google Ad Preferences page or by using the Google Analytics opt-out browser add-on. Palaroidew@gmail.com +9 888 4567 3200 Block 5, Sobha Iris Condominium, Devarabisanahalli, Bellandur, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560103 Privacy Policy Terms conditions Cookies Disclaimer We use cookies to give you the best experience on our website. By clicking "I understand" you acknowledge that you have read and agree to our Privacy Policy and Terms and Conditions. We'll use these to personalize your experience and improve our website. pages.terms-conditions: Eywec's User Agreement: Rules for Your Online Glasses Shopping Experience Palaroidew Home Catalog About Contacts Home Catalog About Contacts Terms and Conditions of Use By using our website, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these terms of service. We strive to offer a safe and enjoyable shopping experience for all our customers. We are committed to providing you with the best selection of vintage photo cameras and authentic prices. Most of the items on our site are in stock and will ship within 2-3 business days of your order being processed. If you are not satisfied with your purchase, please contact us and we will do our best to assist you. We cannot offer refunds or exchanges for any products on our site. If you are not satisfied with your purchase, please contact us and we will do our best to assist you. We reserve the right to cancel or suspend your account if you are in violation of these terms of service. We reserve the right to refuse service to anyone for any reason at any time. You are responsible for making sure that you have the legal right and authority to use any products on our site. If you are unsure whether you have the right to use a particular product, you should not make a purchase. We do not knowingly sell, buy, or trade any counterfeit, pirated, or stolen products on our site. If you suspect that you have received a counterfeit or pirated product from us, please contact us immediately so that we can investigate and take appropriate action. We reserve the right to terminate your account if you violate any of the terms of service. Please be aware that under no circumstances are you allowed to sell, rent, lease, assign, distribute, or host any of our content on your website or any other platform. pages.thanks: Thank you for your purchase! Thank You! Thank you for your purchase from Eywec, the online shop for vintage glasses. We're thrilled to have you as a part of our community of glass enthusiasts. We believe that vintage glasses are unique pieces of art and history, and we're committed to finding the best quality ones for our customers. We're passionate about providing a personalized shopping experience, from sourcing to delivery, so we can ensure that you find the perfect pair of glasses for your needs and budget. We're grateful for your support, and we hope to be your go-to destination for all things vintage glasses. browse our collection

pages.catalog: Eywec - Explore the World of Vintage Glasses Palaroidew Home Catalog About Contacts Home Catalog About Contacts Eywec - Online Shop of Vintage Glasses Welcome to Eywec, your one-stop shop for vintage glasses. Browse our collection of historic glasses, carefully restored and ready for you to enjoy. Whether you're a collector, a fashionista, or simply looking to add some personality to your home, we have something for everyone. Shop sustainably and support the community of glass collectors and enthusiasts with every purchase. 399$ order 499$ order 599$ order 699$ order 1499$ order 1999$ order 1499$ order 1999$ order At Eywec, we're passionate about providing our customers with the highest quality vintage glasses. That's why we've carefully curated our collection to include only the best of the best. From vintage classics to modern releases, our glasses are sure to satisfy any fashion lover's taste. And with our high-quality glasses, you'll make a statement wherever you go. We understand that every fashion lover has their own unique taste, which is why we've put together a diverse collection of glasses that cater to a wide range of fashion styles. Whether you're into bold, colorful designs or more understated, elegant styles, we've got you covered. So why wait? Browse our collection today and discover the joy of vintage glasses at Eywec. Our glasses are not just functional; they're works of art in their own right. Designed with the highest quality materials and craftsmanship, they're sure to make a statement wherever you place them. From sleek and modern designs to vintage-inspired styles, our glasses are sure to impress. Each item in our collection is conscientiously created, ensuring that we uphold the highest standards of quality and craftsmanship. This means sourcing materials from reputable suppliers, using only the finest craftsmanship techniques, and carefully inspecting every product before it leaves our workshop. This attention to detail is what sets us apart from other online retailers and ensures that you receive the highest quality products when you shop with Eywec. pages.cookies: Eywec's Privacy Policy: Protecting Your Online Glasses Shopping Experience Palaroidew Home Catalog About Contacts Home Catalog About Contacts Cookies policy for Eywec Eywec uses cookies to improve your online shopping experience and offer a better user experience. A cookie is a small amount of data that is stored in your device by a website you visit. There are two types of cookies: Session cookies: these cookies expire when you close your browser. Persistent cookies: these cookies remain in your device until you delete them. We use both session and persistent cookies on our site. The cookies we use are: Google Analytics: we use Google Analytics to track how you move through our website. This helps us improve our website and provide a better user experience. Social media cookies: we use social media cookies to show personalized content and relevant ads in your browsing experience on our website. Shopping cart cookies: we use shopping cart cookies to remember the items you have added to your shopping cart and display the number of items in your shopping cart. Functionality cookies: we use functionality cookies to remember your preferences, such as language or currency. You can change your settings to accept or decline cookies through your browser settings. However, if you decline cookies, you may not be able to enjoy all the features of our website. You can also opt to block the use of cookies by Google Analytics by installing the browser extension to opt-out of privacy. This will prevent any additional information from being collected. By continuing to use our website, you agree to our use of cookies.
